accessibilityStatement.pageDescription: The accessibility statement for the {brandName} website. We are committed to providing an equal and accessible experience for all users, including advanced customization tools.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Accessibility
commitment.p1: {companyNameLegal}, operating the {brandName} website, considers it of utmost importance to make its services accessible to people with disabilities, to enable a comfortable, efficient, and equal browsing experience for all users. We invest significant effort and resources to ensure the website meets the requirements of the Equal Rights for People with Disabilities Regulations (Service Accessibility Adjustments), 2013.
commitment.p2: Accessibility adjustments were made in accordance with the recommendations of the Israeli Standard (IS 5568) for web content accessibility at the AA level, based on the international WCAG 2.1 guidelines.

level.title: Accessibility Level and Compliance
level.item1: Accessibility Level: The site supports the standard's requirements at the AA level.
level.item2: Supported Browsers: The site has been tested and supports the most common modern browsers, including Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari, and Microsoft Edge in their latest versions.

features.title: Accessibility Measures on the Site
features.p1: A wide range of technological measures have been implemented on the site to ensure an optimal user experience for all visitors.
features.p2: The site features a dedicated accessibility tool that allows users to customize the site's display to their personal needs. The accessibility menu can be opened by clicking the floating accessibility button in the corner of the screen. The tool offers the following options:

fontAdjustment.title: Font Size Adjustment
fontAdjustment.description: Allows increasing and decreasing the text on the site to the user's comfortable reading level.

contrastModes.title: Display and Contrast Modes
contrastModes.description: Includes a high-contrast mode and a dark display mode (inverted contrast) to improve readability for users with visual impairments.

readableFont.title: Readable Font
readableFont.description: Switches the site's font to a basic, readable, sans-serif font to improve the reading experience.

largeCursor.title: Large Cursor
largeCursor.description: Enlarges the mouse cursor for easier identification and navigation.

textToSpeech.title: Text-to-Speech
textToSpeech.description: Enables a text reader that reads selected content with a mouse click, assisting those with reading difficulties.

reduceMotion.title: Reduce Motion
reduceMotion.description: Disables or reduces animations and movements on the site for users sensitive to motion.

features.keyboardNav: Keyboard Navigation: The site is fully adapted for keyboard-only navigation (using Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, and arrow keys). We have ensured a clear visual indication of the focus location.
features.screenReader: Screen Reader Compatibility: The site was built using correct semantic structure (headings, paragraphs, lists) and ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) attributes to ensure full compatibility with screen reader software such as NVDA and JAWS.
features.altText: Alternative Text for Images: All significant images on the site have alternative text (Alt Text) detailing their content. Decorative images are hidden from screen readers.
features.accessibleForms: Accessible Forms: All forms on the site, including registration forms and questionnaires, include clear labels, group definitions (Fieldset), and filling instructions.
features.noFlashing: Avoidance of Flashing Content: The site does not contain flashing or rapidly moving content that could endanger users.

limitations.title: Non-Accessible Areas and Contact
limitations.p1: We do our best to ensure that all parts of the site are fully accessible. However, some parts or capabilities may be discovered that have not yet been fully made accessible. We are continuing our efforts to improve the site's accessibility as part of our commitment to enabling its use for the entire population.
limitations.p2: If you encounter an accessibility issue or have a suggestion for improvement, we would appreciate it if you contact us. We see your inquiries as an opportunity for improvement.

contact.title: Accessibility Coordinator Details
contact.p1: For any accessibility-related inquiries, you can contact the company's accessibility coordinator:
contact.name: Name: {accessibilityCoordinatorName}
contact.p2: In your inquiry, please include as many details as possible: a description of the problem, a link to the page where you encountered the problem, and details of your operating system and browser.
contact.p3: This statement was last updated on: {lastUpdatedDate}.

privacyPolicy.pageDescription: {brandName}'s privacy policy. How we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacyPolicy.mainTitle: Privacy Policy – Neshama Tech (Jewish Matchpoint Ltd.)

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: We at {companyNameLegal} (Co. No. {companyNumber}), operating under the brand name "Neshama Tech" (hereinafter: "the Company", "the System", "the Service", "Neshama Tech", "we", or "our"), respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This Privacy Policy (hereinafter: "the Policy") describes how we collect, use, process, disclose, transfer, and store your personal information in connection with your use of the Company's website (hereinafter: "the Website") and the services offered through it.
introduction.p2: "Personal Information" or "Information" is defined as information as defined in the Privacy Protection Law, 1981 (hereinafter: "the Law"), including data about an identified or identifiable person, such as name, identification number, location data, an online identifier, or information concerning their physical, mental, economic, or social status.
introduction.p3: This policy is an integral part of the System's Terms of Use. We recommend that you read it carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal information and your rights.

consent.title: 1. Consent, Database, and Legal Clarification
consent.p1: By registering for the system, using it, and particularly by providing your personal details (whether directly or through an authorized matchmaker of the Company acting with your consent), you express your free, explicit, and informed consent to the terms set out in this Policy. This consent includes the collection, processing, storage, use, and sharing of your personal information, including sensitive information, as detailed below.
consent.p2: You are under no legal obligation to provide us with information, and the provision of information is done of your own free will and with your consent. However, if you choose not to provide certain information required for the provision of the service, we may not be able to provide you with the services, in whole or in part. For example, without filling out a personal profile, we cannot offer you matches.
consent.p3: You acknowledge that the information you provide will be stored in the Company's database (hereinafter: "the Database"), which is legally registered. The owner of the database is {companyNameLegal}, Co. No. {companyNumber}, and its registered address is {companyRegisteredAddress}.
consent.p4: If you do not agree to the terms of this Policy, in whole or in part, you must refrain from any use of the system and from providing your personal details.

collectedInfo.title: 2. What information do we collect?
collectedInfo.p1: We collect various types of personal information, whether provided directly by you, collected automatically, or provided to us by Company matchmakers acting with your consent:

list1.item1: Identification, registration, and contact details: Full name, email address, phone number (used for verification and contact), password (encrypted).

item2.title: Detailed profile information (which may include sensitive information):
item2.subItem1: Demographics and personality: Gender, date of birth, languages, height, marital status, occupation, education, city of residence, ethnicity, religious background (self-definition, type of kippah/head covering, observance of 'negi'a'), military/national service, existence of children from a previous relationship, character traits, hobbies, immigration details, free text "about myself", parental status, and number of siblings.
item2.subItem2: Matchmaking preferences: Age and height ranges, religious levels, geographical locations, preferred education and occupations, preference regarding children from a previous relationship, ethnic origins, and more.
item2.subItem3: Medical information (subject to your separate consent): If you choose to do so, the system allows you to provide information regarding a specific medical condition. Providing this information is completely voluntary and is intended to assist in finding a match with understanding and transparency. You have full control over the visibility of medical information, and it will only be disclosed to other parties if you explicitly indicate that you want the information to be visible.

list1.item3: Photos and videos: Photos you have uploaded to your profile and videos you have uploaded to the system.
list1.item4: Questionnaire answers (highly sensitive information): Detailed answers to the system's questionnaires on values, personality, relationships, preferences, religion, and faith.
list1.item5: Interaction and feedback information: Responses to match suggestions and feedback on meetings.
list1.item6: Payment details (if and when relevant): When purchasing paid services, you may be asked to provide payment details. We clarify that these payment details are processed through an external PCI-compliant payment provider and are not stored in the Company's databases.

collectedInfo.subTitle2: 2.2. Information entered into the system by an authorized Company matchmaker:
collectedInfo.p2: An authorized matchmaker may enter details about you into the system, which were provided to them by you directly. In these cases, the matchmaker will act to obtain your explicit consent, we will act to inform you of the inclusion of your details in the database, and you will be given the option to create an account and manage your information.
collectedInfo.p3_1: Cookies, Google Analytics, and tracking technologies:
collectedInfo.p3_2: A "Cookie" is a small text file stored on your device used to collect information about your activity, save your preferences, and improve the user experience. We use cookies essential for the proper functioning of the site (e.g., for managing your account connection), as well as analytical and statistical cookies.
collectedInfo.p3_3: The use of non-essential cookies, particularly those of the Google Analytics service, is subject to your explicit consent, which can be expressed and managed through the "cookie banner" that appears on your first visit to the site.
collectedInfo.p3_4: We use the Google Analytics service to collect and analyze anonymous statistical information about the use of the site. This service helps us understand visitor behavior (such as which pages are popular, how long users stay on the site, and from which traffic sources they come), in order to continuously improve the service and user experience. Google Analytics uses "cookies" and other anonymous identifiers to collect this information. It is important to emphasize that we do not combine the information collected through Google Analytics with personally identifiable information.
collectedInfo.p3_5: In accordance with Google's terms of service, we inform you that our use of Google Analytics is subject to how Google collects and processes data. You can read more about this at the link: "How Google uses information from sites or apps that use our services".
collectedInfo.p3_6: You can control and manage your cookie preferences. If you wish to prevent Google Analytics from collecting data about your browsing, you can install the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on. Additionally, most modern browsers allow you to block or delete existing cookies through the browser settings.
collectedInfo.p3_7: Log Files and Device Data: Like most internet services, our servers automatically collect basic technical information that your browser or device sends, such as IP address, browser type, operating system, and timestamps. We use this information to analyze trends, properly manage the site, for security, and to troubleshoot issues.

list2.item1: Call recordings: Phone calls with Company representatives may be recorded for quality control, service improvement, documentation, and legal defense purposes.
list2.item2: Social networks: When you contact us through channels like WhatsApp or other platforms, the information you provide will also be subject to the privacy policy of that platform.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.p1: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

list.item1: To Provide and Operate the Service: To grant you access to the system, create and manage your profile, and provide you with relevant match suggestions.
list.item2: Communication: To contact you regarding your account, update you on new suggestions, and provide technical support and customer service.
list.item3: Service Improvement and Development: To analyze usage patterns, collect feedback, and improve our algorithms, features, and user experience.
list.item4: Security and Safety: To verify identities, prevent fraud and prohibited activities, and enforce our Terms of Service.
list.item5: Marketing (subject to your consent): To send you updates, promotions, and marketing materials that may be of interest to you.
list.item6: Legal Obligations: To comply with legal requirements, regulations, and judicial orders.
list.item7: Research and Statistics: To conduct statistical analyses and research based on aggregated and anonymous information.

sharingInfo.title: 4. With Whom We Share Your Information
sharingInfo.p1: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your information with third parties only in the following cases:

list.item1: Other Users and Matchmakers: The core of the service is sharing your profile with other users and authorized matchmakers in the system for the purpose of finding a match.
list.item2: Service Providers: We use external providers who assist us in operating the service (such as cloud hosting providers, mailing services, payment processors). We share only the necessary information with them to provide their services, and they are obligated to maintain confidentiality.
list.item3: Legal Requirement: If we are required to do so by law, court order, or in the context of a legal proceeding.
list.item4: Protection of Rights: To enforce our terms, protect the security of the system, or protect the rights, property, and safety of the Company, its employees, its users, or the public.
list.item5: Merger or Acquisition: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of company assets, the information may be transferred to the acquiring entity.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.p1: We take reasonable technological and organizational security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. These include using encryption (such as SSL), access controls, firewalls, and internal security procedures. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot absolutely guarantee the security of the information.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.p1: We will retain your personal information as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with services, as well as to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. After account closure, we may retain certain information in an anonymous or aggregated form for analytical purposes.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.p1: According to the Privacy Protection Law, you are entitled to review the information about you held in our database. Additionally, if you find that the information is incorrect, incomplete, unclear, or not up-to-date, you may contact us with a request to correct or delete the information. These rights can be exercised by contacting us via the contact details provided at the end of this policy.

crossBorder.title: 8. International Data Transfer
crossBorder.p1: The Company may use cloud services whose servers are located outside the borders of Israel. By using the service, you consent to the transfer of your information outside of Israel, with the understanding that the Company will take reasonable steps to ensure that your information continues to be protected in accordance with this policy.

minors.title: 9. Minors
minors.p1: The service is intended for users over the age of 18 only. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it immediately.

changes.title: 10. Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We reserve the right to update this policy from time to time. In the event of a material change, we will notify you through a prominent notice on the site or by sending an email. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.p1: For any question, request, or issue regarding your privacy, please contact us:
